ISSUE.TITLE: Remove vw_ensemble backend
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'd like to remove the `vw_ensemble` backend. The neural network ensemble (`nn_ensemble`) has essentially the same features (e.g. incremental learning) and works much better. It doesn't make sense to maintain two backends for the same purpose and it would take a significant amount of work to get good quality results from `vw_ensemble`, if it's even possible.
